com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes

Class RFC2396DomainName

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.datatypes.RFC2396DomainName
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemanticString

    public class RFC2396DomainName
extends java.lang.Object
implements SemanticString
    RFC2396DomainName represents a host name from the RFC2396 specification.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

      • newInstance

        public static RFC2396DomainName newInstance(java.lang.String rfc2396DomainNameString)
                                     throws java.text.ParseException
        Parses an RFC2396 domain name of the form [domain.[domain.[...]].name[:port-range] to create a new RFC2396DomainName.
        Parameters:
        rfc2396DomainNameString - the String name to parse
        Returns:
        a new RFC2396DomainName generated from the given String
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if there is an error parsing the name.
